00042       function                _return_or_throw( $DefaultValue , $Field )
00043       {
00044             if( $DefaultValue === '_throw_exception' )
00045             {
00046                   throw( new Exception( "Key '$Field' does not exists" ) );
00047             }
00048             else
00049             {
00050                   return( $DefaultValue );
00051             }
00052       }

00084       function                get_field( &$Entity , $Field , $DefaultValue = '_throw_exception' )
00085       {
00086             try
00087             {
00088                   if( is_object( $Entity ) )
00089                   {
00090                         if( property_exists( $Entity , $Field ) )
00091                         {
00092                               return( $Entity->$Field );
00093                         }
00094                         
00095                         return( _return_or_throw( $DefaultValue , $Field ) );
00096                   }
00097                   
00098                   if( is_array( $Entity ) )
00099                   {
00100                         if( array_key_exists( $Field , $Entity ) )
00101                         {
00102                               return( $Entity[ $Field ] );
00103                         }
00104                         
00105                         return( _return_or_throw( $DefaultValue , $Field ) );
00106                   }
00107                   
00108                   throw( new Exception( "Illegal value was passed" ) );
00109             }
00110             catch( Exception $e )
00111             {
00112                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00113             }
00114       }

00146       function                get_fields( &$Entity , $Fields , $DefaultValue = '_throw_exception' )
00147       {
00148             try
00149             {
00150                   $Values = array();
00151                   $Fields = explode( ',' , $Fields );
00152                   
00153                   foreach( $Fields as $i => $Field )
00154                   {
00155                         $Values [] = get_field( $Entity , $Field , $DefaultValue );
00156                   }
00157                   
00158                   return( $Values );
00159             }
00160             catch( Exception $e )
00161             {
00162                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00163             }
00164       }

00192       function                is_field_set( &$Entity , $Field )
00193       {
00194             try
00195             {
00196                   if( is_object( $Entity ) )
00197                   {
00198                         if( property_exists( $Entity , $Field ) )
00199                         {
00200                               return( true );
00201                         }
00202                   }
00203                   
00204                   if( is_array( $Entity ) )
00205                   {
00206                         if( isset( $Entity[ $Field ] ) )
00207                         {
00208                               return( true );
00209                         }
00210                   }
00211                   
00212                   return( false );
00213             }
00214             catch( Exception $e )
00215             {
00216                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00217             }
00218       }

00259                   }
00260                   
00261                   return( $RetValues );
00262             }
00263             catch( Exception $e )
00264             {
00265                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00266             }

00295       function                array_filter_ex( &$ArrayOfEntities , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00296       {
00297             try
00298             {
00299                   $FilterFunction = create_function( '$Element' , "return( $Condition );" );
00300                   
00301                   $FilteredArrayOfEntities = array_filter( $ArrayOfEntities , $FilterFunction );
00302                   
00303                   return( $FilteredArrayOfEntities );
00304             }
00305             catch( Exception $e )
00306             {
00307                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00308             }

00345       function                get_field_cond( &$ArrayOfEntities , $Field , $Condition = '1 = 1' , 
00346                                                                                                                               $DefaultValue = '_throw_exception' )
00347       {
00348             try
00349             {
00350                   $RetValues = array();
00351                   
00352                   $FilteredArrayOfEntities = array_filter_ex( $ArrayOfEntities , $Condition );
00353 
00354                   foreach( $FilteredArrayOfEntities as $k => $v )
00355                   {
00356                         $RetValues [] = get_field( $v , $Field , $DefaultValue );
00357                   }
00358                   
00359                   return( $RetValues );
00360             }
00361             catch( Exception $e )
00362             {
00363                   $Args = func_get_args();throw( _get_exception_object( __FUNCTION__ , $Args , $e ) );
00364             }
00365       }

00397       function                array_sum_cond( &$Array , $Field = false , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00398       {
00399             try
00400             {
00401                   if( count( $Array ) )
00402                   {
00403                         $Keys = array_keys( $Array );
00404                         
00405                         if( is_array( $Array[ $Keys[ 0 ] ] ) )
00406                         {
00407                               $Sum = 0;
00408                               foreach( $Array as $i => $Element )
00409                               {
00410                                     $Sum += array_sum_cond( $Element , $Field , $Condition );
00411                               }
00412                               return( $Sum );
00413                         }
00414                   }
00415                   
00416                   if( $Field !== false )
00417                   {
00418                         $Array = get_field_cond( $Array , $Field , $Condition );
00419                   }
00420                   
00421                   return( array_sum( $Array ) );
00422             }
00423             catch( Exception $e )
00424             {
00425                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00426             }
00427       }

00459       function                set_field( &$Entity , $Field , $Value )
00460       {
00461             try
00462             {
00463                   if( is_object( $Entity ) )
00464                   {
00465                         $Entity->$Field = $Value;
00466                         return( $Entity );
00467                   }
00468                   
00469                   if( is_array( $Entity ) )
00470                   {
00471                         $Entity[ $Field ] = $Value;
00472                         return( $Entity );
00473                   }
00474                   
00475                   return( $Entity );
00476             }
00477             catch( Exception $e )
00478             {
00479                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00480             }
00481       }

00513       function                append_to_field( &$Entity , $Field , $Value )
00514       {
00515             try
00516             {
00517                   if( is_field_set( $Entity , $Field ) === false || get_field( $Entity , $Field , false ) === false )
00518                   {
00519                         set_field( $Entity , $Field , array() );
00520                   }
00521                   
00522                   if( is_object( $Entity ) )
00523                   {
00524                         array_push( $Entity->$Field , $Value );
00525                   }
00526                   
00527                   if( is_array( $Entity ) )
00528                   {
00529                         array_push( $Entity[ $Field ] , $Value );
00530                   }
00531                   
00532                   return( $Entity );
00533             }
00534             catch( Exception $e )
00535             {
00536                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00537             }
00538       }

00608       function                extend( &$Destination , $Source )
00609       {
00610             try
00611             {
00612                   if( $Source === false )
00613                   {
00614                         return( $Destination );
00615                   }
00616                   
00617                   foreach( $Source as $k => $v )
00618                   {
00619                         $Destination = set_field( $Destination , $k , $v );
00620                   }
00621                   
00622                   return( $Destination );
00623             }
00624             catch( Exception $e )
00625             {
00626                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00627             }
00628       }

00656       function                array_sum_ex( &$Array , $Field = false )
00657       {
00658             try
00659             {
00660                   $Array2 = $Array;
00661                   
00662                   if( $Field !== false )
00663                   {
00664                         $Array2 = get_field_ex( $Array , $Field );
00665                   }
00666                   
00667                   return( array_sum( $Array2 ) );
00668             }
00669             catch( Exception $e )
00670             {
00671                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00672             }

00697       function                get_dummie( &$Entity )
00698       {
00699             try
00700             {
00701                   if( is_array( $Entity ) )
00702                   {
00703                         return( array() );
00704                   }
00705                   elseif( is_object( $Entity ) )
00706                   {
00707                         return( new stdClass() );
00708                   }
00709                   else
00710                   {
00711                         throw( new Exception( "Illegal data type : ".gettype( $Entity ) ) );
00712                   }
00713             }
00714             catch( Exception $e )
00715             {
00716                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00717             }
00718       }

00746       function                remove_fields( &$Entity , $Fields )
00747       {
00748             try
00749             {
00750                   if( is_array( $Fields ) === false )
00751                   {
00752                         $Fields = array( $Fields );
00753                   }
00754                   
00755                   $ChangedEntity = get_dummie( $Entity );
00756                   
00757                   foreach( $Entity as $Field => $Value )
00758                   {
00759                         if( array_search( $Field , $Fields ) === false )
00760                         {
00761                               set_field( $ChangedEntity , $Field , $Value );
00762                         }
00763                   }
00764                   
00765                   return( $Entity = $ChangedEntity );
00766             }
00767             catch( Exception $e )
00768             {
00769                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00770             }
00771       }

00795       function                make_array( &$Scalar )
00796       {
00797             try
00798             {
00799                   if( is_array( $Scalar ) || is_object( $Scalar ) )
00800                   {
00801                         return( $Scalar );
00802                   }
00803                   else
00804                   {
00805                         return( array( $Scalar ) );
00806                   }
00807             }
00808             catch( Exception $e )
00809             {
00810                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00811             }
00812       }

00840       function                make_hash_by_field( &$Array , $Field )
00841       {
00842             try
00843             {
00844                   $Return = array();
00845                   
00846                   foreach( $Array as $k => $v )
00847                   {

00849                   }
00850                   
00851                   return( $Return );
00852             }
00853             catch( Exception $e )
00854             {
00855                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00856             }

00885       function                vectorize_by_field( &$Array , $Field )
00886       {
00887             try
00888             {
00889                   $Return = array();
00890                   
00891                   foreach( $Array as $k => $v )
00892                   {
00893                         $Key = get_field( $v , $Field );
00894                         
00895                         if( isset( $Return[ $Key ] ) === false )
00896                         {
00897                               $Return[ $Key ] = array();
00898                         }
00899                         
00900                         $Return[ $Key ][] = $v;
00901                   }
00902                   
00903                   return( $Return );
00904             }
00905             catch( Exception $e )
00906             {
00907                   $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00908             }
00909       }

00937       function                sort_by_field( &$Array , $Field )
00938       {
00939             usort( 
00940                   $Array , 
00941                   create_function( 
00942                         '$a , $b' , 
00943                         'return( get_field( $a , "'.$Field.'" ) < get_field( $b , "'.$Field.'" ) );'
00944                   )
00945             );
00946       }

00977                   $Array ,

00979                         '$a , $b' , 
00980                         'return( get_field( $a , "'.$Field.'" ) > get_field( $b , "'.$Field.'" ) );'
00981                   )
00982             );
00983       }
